attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Declare that the Prime Minister, his ministers,(including those of the opposition),including the House of Commons Speaker and his/her associates be declared that Parliamnetary Priveledge be withdrawn in the respect that "they are deemed to be able to tell lies" within the legal format of the framework of the constitution, in order that they can not hide behind men in tights by stating that they can only tell "untruth's" which do not formulate into any legal and judicial system.

As duly elected representatives of the said house, they are duty bound to be honest and truthfull in all aspects of their duties with regards to their representatives, and as such should be held responsible within normal legal perameters such as those by which common people are judged and by which they should also be accountable.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
